text: Tumhen kiya hogaya hai? Kay munafiqon kay baray mein do giroh ho rahey ho? Unhen to unn kay aemaal ki waja say Allah Taalaa ney ondha ker diya hai. Abb kiya tum yeh mansoobay bandh rahey ho kay Allah Taalaa kay gumrah kiye huwon ko tum raah-e-raast per laa khara kero jissay Allah Taalaa raah bhula dey tu hergiz uss kay liye koi raah na paye ga
